name: Alloy Soldier Xenia
description:
UNIT X-3-N-1A ACTIVATED SEARCHING FOR MEMORIES.... .... ... WARNING: MEMORIES NOT FOUND MEMORIES CAN BE RECOVERED BY INSTALLING ABILITY CHIPS .... ... .... WARNING .... WHAT IS YOUR PURPOSE?

....

GO OUT AND FIND YOUR PURPOSE, SOLDIER


Alloy Soldier Xenia is an open world action adventure platformer where you control a battle android in search of her memories and her purpose.

Created with Pixel Game Maker MV

Pixel Game Maker MV belongs to Kadokawa Corporation © 2018 Kadokawa Corporation

GAME FEATURES

RPG system. Defeat enemies, gain experience and enhance your desired stats. Two weapon builds: melee and ranged. Over 7 areas full of dangers and gruesome enemies. 8 fearsome bosses. Secret items hidden all over the world. Post apocalyptic atmosphere. Unique original soundtrack. Retro graphics and retro sounds. Ability chips that grant you new abilites.
